description: Strong understanding of industrial applications of 3D technology, including various production chains (Computer-Aided Design, animation, virtual reality), and diverse technological platforms (PC, smartphones, Web, consoles).
degree: Master of Computer Science and Applications 3D Engineering and Media Technology

description: Skills in Information Technology Services for Organizations, emphasizing the development and implementation of software solutions tailored to meet the specific needs of businesses.
degree: BTS SIO (Services Informatiques aux Organisations), option SLAM (Solutions Logicielles et Applications Métiers)

description: Provide a strong foundation in scientific disciplines, including mathematics, physics, chemistry, and biology. With an additional focus on Computer Science and Digital Sciences, to develop a proficiency in programming, algorithms, and understanding the impact of digital technologies on society.
degree: Baccalauréat S (Scientifique), spécialité ISN (Informatique et Sciences du Numérique)
